data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Yamal-Nenets, Russia.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Yamal-Nenets, Russia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Yamal-Nenets, Russia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Yamal-Nenets.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 7,652 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Nenets, Yurak Samoyed people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, help the 7,652 believers find a person of peace today among the 515,247 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Yamal-Nenets, Russia humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Yamal-Nenets, Russia.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

location.name: Yamal-Nenets
location.cities_list: Noyabrsk, Novyy Urengoy, Nadym, Muravlenko, Salekhard
location.cities_list_w_pop: Noyabrsk (110,000), Novyy Urengoy (94,212), Nadym (46,339), Muravlenko (39,137), Salekhard (38,025)
